pr_title: [Dubbo-5872] use QOS command to check if app service is ready

timeline.message: [Dubbo-5872] use QOS command to check if app service is ready

timeline.bodyText: Why is the default value not false?
timeline.author: lkj41110

replies.bodyText: Sometimes user would not call the DubboBootstrap.start method, so then the app ready function would not working, then the app should ready in default!
replies.author: Hinsteny
